SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[CoreFormsButtons] ( [CoreFormsButtons_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [CoreForms_Ky] int NULL , [CoreFormsButtons_Title] varchar(100) NULL , [CoreFormsButtons_Icon] varchar(100) NULL , [CoreFormsButtons_Action] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreFormsButtons_Order] int NULL , [CoreFormsButtons_UserInsert] int NULL , [CoreFormsButtons_UserUpdate] int NULL , [CoreFormsButtons_UserDelete] int NULL , [CoreFormsButtons_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [CoreFormsButtons_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [CoreFormsButtons_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[CoreFormsButtons] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CoreFormsButtons PRIMARY KEY ([CoreFormsButtons_Ky])
